metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46244 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: A Divide By Zero vulnerability exists in HDF5 v1.13.1-1 vis the functionH5T__complete_copy () at /hdf5/src/H5T.c. This vulnerability causes anaritmetic exception, leading to a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
kissplice package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
paraview package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
vtk package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
vtk6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
xdmf package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
